title: Unable to show weather info for this location - Pixel 5
content:
Weather displays accurately for my location in the "At a Glance" homescreen widget. However, when I click on the icon, I get the message "Unable to show weather info for this location." When I click in the "Search places" bar, I see an empty slot labeled "Your location", but it's blank. Normally it would list my actual location, Philadelphia PA. 

This also affects Assistant features. When I ask, "What's the weather?" or anything similar, all I get are web results.

I have done many things to try to fix this and have talked to multiple support people on chat:
Reset App Permissions
Factor Reset Device
Check that Location is on and enabled for Google and Pixel Launcher
Checked Roaming settings

This was not an issue on my Pixel 3. It just started when I got my new Pixel 5. I believe it may be a hardware issue at this point, since factory reset didn't help.

Please help.
